desc: Currently working as a Junior Backend Developer, focusing on building scalable, high-performance APIs using Node.js, Express.js, and TypeScript. Improved data handling through TypeORM while integrating both MongoDB and PostgreSQL. Implemented Redis caching to optimize application speed and reduce load times.

Worked as a Backend Developer Intern, contributing to API development and server-side logic using Node.js, Express.js, and TypeScript. Managed databases through TypeORM with MongoDB and PostgreSQL. Also contributed to server-side rendering of dynamic content using Handlebars.
